items.sentence: I suspect that Tom won't believe anything that you say.
This chair is uncomfortable. I'll sit in the other one.
I should be studying French now, instead of doing this.
Mary looked adorable and cute in her Halloween costume.
Tom said that he was going over to Mary's to apologize.
Would you consider yourself an optimist or a pessimist?
I hung out with some of my friends yesterday afternoon.
What could we have done to prevent this from happening?
Tom left early in order to avoid the rush hour traffic.
Both Tom and Mary were very skinny when they were kids.
